casebody.data:
2002-0910 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Charles AUGUSTINE and John Hart, Jr. No. 2002-KK-0910. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Augustine, Charles et al.; Hart, John Jr.-Defendant(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of St. Mary, 16th Judicial District Court Div. G, Nos. 01-158021, 01-158022; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2002 KW 0061.

Denied.

JOHNSON, J., would grant the writ
